Text:
Hate to be one of these fucking people, but does this work on a PS3 without screwing up the audio sync?

I can't keep downloading 1-2GB files only to find out they have issues.  Everything I've tried on my Mac to fix the sync doesn't work either.
Is there any issues with playback on a ps3 with this file?, have downloaded others where the audio/video are not in sync

Finished downloading now and tested this on my ps3 and it works fine, audio and video are perfectly in sync.

Plus picture quality is better than other dvd rips, the picture is sharper 

Good job Bone
